metadata.description: MeLegend.io is a Generative collection of 6888 unique game characters. Owning a Legend is your one-way portal to the world of our RPG game, The Fallen Gate. Work your way up to the top, beat PVE bosses or challenge other players in PVP while making $MLG. Buy, craft and obtain new equipment, make alliances and uncover the story. Become a Legend and make your mark on the blockchain.
metadata.name: Legend #1
